sentence: The  numbers  that  capture  the  state  of  Gaza  after  100  days  of  war  are  staggering:  Nearly  2  million  displaced,  thousands  of  homes  destroyed  and  nearly  24,000  dead  â€”  10,000  of  them  children.

Since  the  outbreak  of  war  on  Oct.  7,  when  the  militant  group  Hamas  broke  into  southern  Israel  and  killed  1,200  people  and  kidnapped  some  250  more,  the  toll  of  Israel's  response  on  Gaza,  which  is  governed  by  Hamas,  has  been  catastrophic  for  the  territory.
But  about  70%  of  the  dead  are  women  and  children,  the  ministry  says.
About  10,000  of  the  dead  are  children  under  the  age  of  18.
3  million  have  been  killed  in  just  over  three  months  of  conflict.
Thousands  have  been  killed,  maimed,  and  orphaned.
More  than  600  healthcare  workers  have  died  in  attacks  and  nearly  800  more  have  been  injured,  according  to  the  WHO.
